info.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Developing a web application for NYIT to manage event tracking, registration, and participation using Django, Django REST Framework, and PostgreSQL for backend development

Tested and improved the official NYIT website using Selenium for automated testing and JIRA for issue tracking, contributing to a 15% increase in page load speed and a 20% reduction in user-reported issues

info.title: Prompt Engineer
bullets: Designed and engineered high-quality prompts for 5+ generative AI projects, fine-tuning various LLMs such as xAI, improving model performance and ensuring accurate outputs.
Promoted to Reviewer role, responsible for evaluating and enhancing the quality of prompts created by team members, maintaining a 98% quality assurance standard across all reviewed projects.
Conducted rigorous prompt testing and A/B comparisons, iterating on prompt designs to drive higher precision in LLM-generated results and improving user satisfaction by 15%.

info.title: AI Software Engineer Fellow
bullets: Built 4+ AI apps and APIs using NextJS, OpenAI, REST, StripeAPI, with 98% accuracy as seen by 1000 users.
Developed projects from design to deployment leading 4+ engineering fellows using MVC design patterns.
Coached by Stripe, Meta and Google engineers on Agile, CI/CD, Git and microservice patterns.

info.title: Web Operator Intern
bullets: Collaborated with a team to build an AI Agent on Google Cloud, seamlessly integrating it into a WordPress website, enabling 2,000 employees to access HR information quickly.
Automated multiple manual processes on the WordPress site by creating Python scripts using Selenium in IntelliJ IDE, significantly reducing operational workload and increasing efficiency.
Led team presentation to the HR department on the AI solution, showcasing the system's capabilities and receiving positive feedback, demonstrating leadership and communication skills.

info.title: Assistant Accountant
bullets: Spearheaded the automation of monthly transaction data entry using python, which increased data entry efficiency by 95%.
Efficiently managed and processed over 20 invoices weekly, resulting in a 15% improvement in payment cycle time.
Conducted regular audits of financial documents, uncovering and resolving discrepancies that saved the company $5,000.

info.title: Solar System Designer
bullets: Designed and implemented 3,500 kW solar panel systems using Helioscope for over 100 clients, accelerating green energy adoption and reducing carbon footprints across New York City.
Authored 5+ in-depth solar photovoltaic cost-benefit analyses, leveraging energy consumption data to provide actionable insights, aiding clients in making informed solar investment decisions.
Assessed solar energy viability for 50 projects across NYC's five boroughs using Helioscope, Google Maps, and NearMap, optimizing system performance and ensuring maximum energy efficiency.

info.title: Web Developer and Research Assistant Intern
bullets: Developed a user-friendly Wi-Fi login interface for over 600,000 clients utilizing HTML, CSS and JavaScript, boosting Wi-Fi usage by 30% and improving the onboarding experience.
Designed and implemented automated python scripts for data analysis, reducing manual workload by 40% and increasing productivity.
Developed robust predictive sales models in R, achieving an 80% accuracy rate and enabling data-driven decisions that optimized business forecasting.
